item.description:
Greetings everyone....

I decided (with Jacki's prompting ;) to make this a meetup. Sooooooooooo

THIS Tuesday, June 22 is the date. Shrewsbury Street is a wonderful place with many eclectic restaurants and shops. Here are the details....

More than 40 restuarants and pubs in the Shrewsbury Street (Worcester) neighborhood will participate. A button, $25 - is your admission to sample the food served at literally dozens of fine dining establishments. My two favorite places - Mezcal & The Flying Rhino are on the list.

Buttons can be purchased at the restaurants or at branches of Flagship Bank and Bay State Savings Bank. I'm not sure how they serve the "tastings" but it sounds like a fun evening.

I suggest we meet at 5:00PM in the bar area at Brew City Grill to begin our journey up Shrewsbury Street.

We can have a subsequent meet time of 6:15 @ Mezcal for those who can't make the 5:00 start . The Brew City Grill is at the bottom of Shrewsbury Street - the end closest to the railroad station.

Hope to see you on Tuesday.

Paul
item.name: A Taste of Shrewsbury Street
